name: 1 Year Subscription
description:
6 Issues of Vintage Caravan Magazine delivered every 2 months to anywhere in the world.
$45 + postage
+$10 post within Australia 
+$20 post rest of the world

Subscriptions start from the NEXT available issue ISSUE 18 - March/April out February 12th 
If you prefer it to start from the current issue (17) please leave a message in the "note to seller" section of the checkout or email subscriptions@vintagecaravanmagazine.com.au to adjust your order.
Otherwise please allow UP TO 6 weeks for your first delivery depending on when you place your order as VCM is a BI-MONTHLY publication

Postage to your address will be calculated at the checkout 
Please ensure your PayPal address is up to date!

If you have selected a GIFT option please leave a message stating the name and address for delivery or email subscriptions@vintagecaravanmagazine.com.au when you place your order with the name and address of the recipient.

options.name: GIFT - email name and address of recipient to: subscriptions@vintagecaravanmagazine.com.au

name: Current Issue 17 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
January/February 2014 Our biggest issue yet!
Featuring Iain & warren's 1940s Home made bondwood Don replica "Woody" from Australia on the cover and inside plus a lift-out centrefold and articles on a 1948 Bondwood (Australia) a 1968 Scotsman (USA) a home made "hot rod" teardrop camper (Australia) the Shady Dell trailer park (USA), Caravan cubbies and event reviews on the Museum of the Long Weekend and Camperdown Rockabilly Cruise plus regular features such as restoration tips, "Trailer Treasure" page, services directory, "Road Trip" events guide and more...

64 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: 2014 Calendar
description:
Vintage Caravan Magazine's 2014 Calendar features striking photos of twelve of the world's cutest vintage caravans with pinup models.

Worldwide delivery available

$20 + post 
($3 within Australia $5 to New Zealand and $7 to everywhere else)

name: Back Issues 7 - 13 PACK
description:
Here's a great deal to get your VCM collection going
The entire 2nd year of Vintage Caravan Magazine from the first birthday issue #7 to the 2nd Birthday issue #13
Issues 7 - 13 of Vintage Caravan Magazine including TWO birthday issues for ONLY $60 + shipping 

WORLDWIDE DELIVERY AVAILABLE - POSTAGE WILL BE CALCULATED AT CHECKOUT USING YOUR PAYPAL SHIPPING ADDRESS
PLEASE ENSURE YOUR PAYPAL ADDRESS IS UP TO DATE!

name: Issue 16 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring Beth Eagle from Love Vintage Caravans in New Zealand's 1966 Silverstream on the cover and inside, plus articles on Lucy Jayne's 1970's Thompson Glendale (U.K.), Kitten Von Mew's 1979 Safari (U.K.), Timeless Caravans latest reproduction retro caravan (New Zealand) and the Samson's 1958 Castle Windcutter (Australia) and a special feature on the creation of the students of a Dutch interior Design school plus a special pinups & caravan lift-out Christmas centrefold plus restoration tips, "Trailer Treasure" page, services directory, "Road Trip" events guide and more...

56 pages Quarto size (210mm x 255mm)

name: Issue 15 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring Airstream dreams 1966 Trade Wind (Australia) on the cover and inside plus a lift-out centrefold and articles on the new Retro Rocket caravans (Australia) and Nancy Lopez's 1962 Yellowstone (USA)  a 1960 Trail-A-Home (Australia) and Poppy Jean's 1959 wedding hire van and a special feature on the lost art of retro sign writing, a trip down Memory Lane plus restoration tips, "Trailer Treasure" page, services directory, "Road Trip" events guide and more...

57 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: Issue 14 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring Mike Well's blue 1962 home built "hot rod" caravan (NZ) on the cover and inside plus a lift-out centrefold and articles on the Keen's 1970's Home built bondwood caravan and 1977 VW Kombi ute (AUS), the Holme's 1961 Chelwyn caravan (AUS), the Sorfonn's Norwegian 1974 Bjolseth, the 2013 Beach Hop Retro Caravan Show (NZ) Autumnfest review (AUS),  plus restoration tips on restoration hazards such as asbestos, "Trailer Treasure" page, services directory, "Road Trip" events guide and more...

48 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: Issue 13 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
The 2nd Birthday Issue of Vintage Caravan Magazine
Featuring Louise Thorpe's 1969 Baravan on the cover (Aus) and articles on the Beach Hop giveaway 1960 Roadhaven caravan restoration (NZ), the VCM Queensland to South Australia road trip and the 2013 Adelaide Caravan Show (Australia), a retro trailer park in France plus "Trailer Treasure" page, vintage film review, services directory, events guide and more...

48 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: Issue 12 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring Mandy's Red & White Capricorn on the cover and articles on a 1957 Gypsy, part 3 of Butcher Bob's Aussie Tour, Lilliputs in New Zealand, Maleny Rockabilly Weekend Review plus "Trailer Treasure" page, Inspiration Point poetry page, services directory, events guide and more...

48 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: Issue 11 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring John and Di Adams "Jellybean" 1950 10-foot bondwood on the cover and articles on a 1952 hire bar conversion, a 1965 hot rod Sunliner, the history of the Viscount brand, Flagstaff Route 66 caravan show and Sisters on the Fly camp at Flagstaff, Arizona, plus restoration tips, "Trailer Treasure" page, retro move review, services directory, events guide and more...

52 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: Issue 10 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
The USA Launch Special Issue
Featuring Elaine Martin's pink 1963 Shasta "My Wings" on the cover and articles on a 1956 Wayfarer, a 1952 Sunliner Fibreglass restoration, a retro teardrop camper, VCM's Route 66 Tour plus reviews of the Geraldine Classic Caravan rally in New Zealand, Independence Day campout in Queensland, plus restoration tips on aluminium parts for your vintage caravan, kitsch kitchen recipe for Pumpkin Pie, "Trailer Treasure" page, services directory, events guide and more...

52 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: Issue 9 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring Belinda Neame's 1964 Sunliner "I am Norma" on the cover and articles on a 1965 Fibreglass Franklin Futura, a 1968 aluminium Franklin, reviews of Garterbelts & Gasoline Nostalgia Festival, Rodz, Rock 'n' Roll Festival, the Gold Coast Heritage Expo plus restoration tips on finding parts for your vintage caravan, kitsch kitchen recipe for Rock Cakes, "Trailer Treasure page, services directory and more...

48 pages A4 size (210mm x 297mm)

name: Issue 8 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Our New Zealand Launch special issue!
Featuring Richard & Judy Hart's 1949 Grace Brothers built 5th wheeler and 1946 Fargo truck on the cover and articles on the Beach Hop (New Zealand), the Sinclairs of New Zealand's 1964 Bondwood caravan, the history of Roadmaster caravans, South Australia, Vintage Caravan Nationals rally at Cowra, restoration tips on transporting your vintage caravan, vintage film review, Trailer treasure and more...

48 pages A4 size

name: Issue 7 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
The FIRST BIRTHDAY special issue 
Featuring Mimsy Gleeson and her 1959 Sunliner on the cover and articles on Sisters on the Fly (USA), vans at work, a 1952 home-built bondwood, Perth Fringe Festival caravans, South Australian vintage caravan rally, and restoration tips on how to wire up your 12-volt connectors, travel feature on Cowra NSW and more...

48 pages A4 size

name: Issue 6 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring the Kraus' 1965 Kennedy on the cover and articles on a 1970 Baravan and EK Holden, a 1957 Buick Caballero and matching 1957 Bondwood caravan, the Miss Pinup Australia State Finals, the Vintage Caravnners Christmas in Canungra (QLD) rally, the Last of the Chrome Bumpers Cora Lynn Country Car Show, Chapter II of Butcher Bob's Aussie Tour and restoration tips on how to lay linoleum, a vintage film review on the 1959 film "Pillow Talk and more...

48 pages A4 size

name: Issue 5 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring Happy Harris's 1952 Holivan on the cover and articles on a reproduction wooden teardrop, a reproduction fibreglass in New Zealand, a 1954 Walsh and a 1977 Glendale along with caravan event reviews and photos, interior style and restoration tips, travel features, classifieds, retro collectibles and more...

48-pages A4 size

name: Issue 4 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
Featuring the Crane's 1956 Home-made aluminium on the cover and articles on Vintage Vans in NZ, a 1955 Supalite, a 1960's Propert and vans from around the world along with caravan event reviews and photos, interior style and restoration tips, travel features, classifieds, retro collectibles and more...

48-pages A4 size

name: Issue 3 Vintage Caravan magazine
description:
Featuring Trish Hunter Finds of Camberwell Markets on the cover and articles on a 1960's Expandavan, 1965 Viscount Duralvan, caravan event reviews and photos, Rodz Rock 'n Roll pics, Restoration Tips, travel features, classifieds, retro collectibles and more...

44-pages A4 size

VERY LIMITED STOCKS LEFT!

name: Issue 2 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
With Mark T's 1950 Don Caravan & FX Holden on the cover.
Featuring articles on a 1950 Don Caravan, caravan event reviews and photos, "The Love Shack" from New Zealand, Vans around the world, Morris Minors go camping, travel features, classifieds, retro collectibles and more...

42-pages A4 size

VERY LIMITED STOCKS LEFT!!!

name: Issue 1 Vintage Caravan Magazine
description:
The highly sought after issue 1 featuring the "Best Little Vintage Van in Vegas" on the cover.
Featuring articles on a 1960's Sunliner restoration, a vintage shop in a caravan, travel features, retro collectibles, recipes, classifieds and more...

LIMITED QUANTITIES AVAILABLE OF THIS COLLECTOR'S ITEM LEFT!


32-pages A4 size

name: A Caravan Holiday - A Trip Down Memory Lane on Two Wheels 1932
description:
Editor Tim Barlass of Forgotten Titles Books has put together this delightful 137-page collector book filled with whimsy, artwork, advertisements, posters and nostalgia and provides insights into life in the 1930's that is sure to appeal to those with an interest in caravanning days of old.
This gorgeous hard cover book is based on the diary of artist Len Smith who travelled around the UK in 1932 with a caravan and recorded his journey in water colour paintings and photos.
